sentences.sContent: A laugh can help people over an awkward situation.
It’ll be awkward getting cars in and out.
sentences.sCn: 这样汽车就不好进出了。

sentences.sContent: Amy made an awkward gesture with her hands.
sentences.sCn: 艾米用双手做了一个笨拙的手势。

synos.tran: 尴尬的；笨拙的；棘手的；不合适的

remMethod.val: aw(看作awe， 恐惧) ＋ kward(看作backward， 向后的) → 由于恐惧所以向后退 → 尴尬的场面 → 尴尬的

trans.tranOther: making you feel embarrassed so that you are not sure what to do or say
